Headline: Temporary Westbound #51 51st Reroute near 51st/Union
ShortDescription: Westbound 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted near 1st/Union

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Halsted, 51st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 51st/Union.

Eastbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
